document_data.name: Devastating
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Devastating''''' was a fishing ship owned by Captain [[Belyssa Erstros]], a whaler from [[Tarmalune]], one of the [[Windrise Ports]] of [[Laerakond]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Quench the Fire of the Raging God|13}}
document_data.Background: In [[1479 DR]], Belyssa Erstros obtained a good fortune and used it to buy her own ship, the ''Devastating''.
